name: Invaders From Space (itch) (Tsunscreen)
description:
It's a bullet hell game. You shoot things!

Created for Bullet Hell Jam 2022 (although originally going to be an entry into Ludum Dare 50's "extra" category, I didn't really start it until after that was over). As a result this game doesn't really fit into any theme. Never created one of these before but I'm happy with the result.

Everything was made by me :)
